title: DCAT Distribution properties as strings
description: The [DCAT Distribution](https://www.w3.org/TR/vocab-dcat/#class-distribution) properties represented as strings.  This aspect is intended to be quite permissive of arbitrary property values, even those that may be difficult or impossible to interpret.

title.title: A name given to the distribution.

issued.title: Date of formal issuance (e.g., publication) of the distribution.

modified.title: Most recent date on which the distribution was changed, updated or modified.

license.title: The license under which the distribution is made available.

rights.title: Information about rights held in and over the distribution.

accessURL.title: A landing page, feed, SPARQL endpoint or other type of resource that gives access to the distribution of the dataset.

accessNotes.title: Instructions on how to access information in the access URL.

downloadURL.title: A file that contains the distribution of the dataset in a given format.

byteSize.title: The size of a distribution in bytes.

mediaType.title: The media type of the distribution as defined by IANA.

format.title: The file format of the distribution.
